mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(login_id, password, email, nickname, age, birthday, gender, profile_img, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{loginId},#{password},#{email},#{nickname},#{age}, #{birthday}, #{gender},#{profileImg}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET login_id = #{loginId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, profile_img = #{profileImg}, updated_at = now()
